entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Wavecade

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Wavecade*):

ul.li: Description: Wavecade is a sci-fi, arcade-style, shoot-em-up where YOU control the speed of the game. Destroy blocks in style as you collect powerups and avoid hazards. How far can you go? Set your own rules and unlock your favourite mode to play.
